definitions.definition: formally and in a way agreed to or arranged by people in positions of authority:
examples: The royal engagement was announced officially this morning.

definitions.definition: as stated or accepted by people publicly but not privately or as things really are:
examples: Well, officially I am on holiday this week, but I'm just catching up on some reports I have to finish.

definitions.definition: in or relating to a position of responsibility that you hold:
examples: He has not visited the country officially since his election, only in a private capacity.
